column4: can anyone explain to me why when installing nvidia drivers is messes up usplash resolution?
the nvidia drivers just don't seem to set the TTYs and boot-up to the right resolution. it's a shame i know
well is there a way to correct it? I'm not sure of what file to edit anymore since adding the correct vga parameters to kernel lines been depreciated and no longer seem to work
no no idea myself, i'm still getting over the mass headache of nvidia+nouveau
